testcase.name: 05-caps_memorystorage

testcase.name: 06-caps_networking

testcase.name: 07-caps_displayresolution
testcase.purpose: Objective: Check if the device supports a display resolution of 480x800 (WVGA) or 720x1280 (HD), or a minimum resolution of 320x480 (HVGA). - Description: Check if the device supports a display resolution of 480x800 (WVGA) or 720x1280 (HD), or a minimum resolution of 320x480 (HVGA).
